S.FORM: maqas cu' cubalay makital ki' isu'
maqas co' cobalay makital ki' iso'
papauwah 'i' inu' ku' sasukuan cu' pila'?
papaowah 'i' ino' ko' sasokoan co' pila'?
nahuqun si' lumpug ku' babaiqan la
nahoqon si' lompog ko' babaiqan la
kai' na' Itaal ru balaiq na' nananiqun
kai' na' Itaal ro balaiq na' nananiqon
wana' pakabalaiq ku' pintuwawan si' pilag
wana' pakabalaiq ko' pintowawan si' pilag
papiya' ku' matasasuway su' ru nanuwan ku' waw naha'?
papiya' ko' matasasoway so' ro nanowan ko' waw naha'?
S.TRANSL: 你有幾個兄弟姊妹他們從事什麼工作？

S.FORM: nanuwan ka gagalgan su' i' musa' i' Taipak
nanowan ka gagalgan so' i' mosa' i' Taipak
balaiq cubalay niqun ku' naniqun na' Itaal cunga'
balaiq cobalay niqon ko' naniqon na' Itaal conga'
riax ka capaang na' balaiq mu
riax ka capaang na' balaiq mo
gaga na' pansamiyan na' Itaal cunga
gaga na' pansamiyan na' Itaal conga
aynu' ku' balaiq su' cubalay ka papkibaqan?
ayno' ko' balaiq so' cobalay ka papkibaqan?
hacuwlun 'i' makibaq cu' kai' na' Itaal?
hacowlon 'i' makibaq co' kai' na' Itaal?
cami ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga makimusa' cami kahbag 'i' maganaw i' Taipak
cami ka qotox co' imowaag ga makimosa' cami kahbag 'i' maganaw i' Taipak
nanuwan ku' patuwawan su' ka hani?
nanowan ko' patowawan so' ka hani?
sumiwa' si' cku' humicuwa' ka mukurakis?
somiwa' si' cko' homicowa' ka mokorakis?
hacuwlun 'i' rumurug ku' cumiyus na' Itaal?
hacowlon 'i' romorog ko' comiyos na' Itaal?
S.TRANSL: 如何進行泰雅族的祖靈儀式？

S.FORM: baqun su' ku' wawwaw nku' yencumin kahabag quw?
baqon so' ko' wawwaw nko' yencomin kahabag qow?
S.TRANSL: 你知道原住民相關的事情嗎？

S.FORM: babah su' ka magabuq cuqang, mausa' si' inu'?
babah so' ka magaboq coqang, maosa' si' ino'?
ma'usa' cu 'i' tinqalangan mital 'i' yaya' ki' yaba'.
ma'osa' co 'i' tinqalangan mital 'i' yaya' ki' yaba'.
S.TRANSL: 我要回（去）部落探望父母。

S.FORM: balaiq kahbag naha', mahway su' cubalay.
balaiq kahbag naha', mahway so' cobalay.
muwani ga, makitalay ta' 'i' casan. nahahiyaw ki'.
mowani ga, makitalay ta' 'i' casan. nahahiyaw ki'.
tila' ga, bali' kiya' waw mu 'i' casan.
tila' ga, bali' kiya' waw mo 'i' casan.
S.TRANSL: 好阿，反正我明天沒有事。

S.FORM: balaiq su' quw? ralu' mu ga Yawi' na' kyusi. ima' a' ralu' su'?
balaiq so' qow? ralo' mo ga Yawi' na' kyosi. ima' a' ralo' so'?
S.TRANSL: 你好，我叫Yawi’ na’ kyusi，請問，你叫什麼名字？

S.FORM: ralu' mu ga Lawa' na' Yukih.
ralo' mo ga Lawa' na' Yokih.
Gipun na' 'i' hiya' muwah 'i' Tabilas 'i' mkibaq cu' kai' na' matu'uwal.
Gipon na' 'i' hiya' mowah 'i' Tabilas 'i' mkibaq co' kai' na' mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 他是（日本）人，來錦水村學汶水語。

S.FORM: sumiwa' cu' gaga' ru kaikai' na' Itaal 'i' hiya'.
somiwa' co' gaga' ro kaikai' na' Itaal 'i' hiya'.
S.TRANSL: 他對汶水泰雅文化很有興趣。

S.FORM: paqasun mu cubalay makital ki' isu'.
paqason mo cobalay makital ki' iso'.
pasibaq ci' cu' kai' na' matu'uwal.
pasibaq ci' co' kai' na' mato'owal.
kai' na' nanuwan ku' sipsibaq su'?
kai' na' nanowan ko' sipsibaq so'?
kiya' ci' pasibaq cu' kai' na' matu'uwal 'i' Tabilas ga.
kiya' ci' pasibaq co' kai' na' mato'owal 'i' Tabilas ga.
balaiq su' 'i' pasibaq ci' cu' kai' na' matu'uwal quw?
balaiq so' 'i' pasibaq ci' co' kai' na' mato'owal qow?
masiqaiyung ci' cubalay la kiya' a' nanuwan ka nananiqun quw?
masiqaiyong ci' cobalay la kiya' a' nanowan ka nananiqon qow?
S.TRANSL: 我的肚子好餓，有東西可以吃嗎？

S.FORM: ini mu katngiani ku' pilikaway makimaniq ci' cu' mami.
ini mo katngiani ko' pilikaway makimaniq ci' co' mami.
S.TRANSL: 李子吃不飽，我想要吃飯。

S.FORM: wal, halngaganay misu' cu' mami' ru qaniq. nanuwan ku' balaiq su' na?
wal, halngaganay miso' co' mami' ro qaniq. nanowan ko' balaiq so' na?
S.TRANSL: 好，我炒飯給你吃，你還要什麼嗎？

S.FORM: mahuway su', malngu' a' ngaquwaq pakaakih 'i' maiq su' cu' qusiya quw?
mahoway so', malngo' a' ngaqowaq pakaakih 'i' maiq so' co' qosiya qow?
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，我口渴，能給我一點水嗎？

S.FORM: qutux kuwing cu' riax musa' 'i' matawwaw cku' ragriyax sawni, masawsug ku' kukuy mu ru pakahngaw cu' la.
qotox kowing co' riax mosa' 'i' matawwaw cko' ragriyax sawni, masawsog ko' kokoy mo ro pakahngaw co' la.
S.TRANSL: 今天去山上工作一整天，現在腿好痠，需要休息。

S.FORM: payux ku' rinuwang mu, pakaaqih su' siagal cu' cacaybing 'i' kwing quw?
payox ko' rinowang mo, pakaaqih so' siagal co' cacaybing 'i' kwing qow?
S.TRANSL: 我流了很多汗，可以幫我拿毛巾嗎？

S.FORM: wal ga, halayanay misu magal ku' cacaybing.
wal ga, halayanay miso magal ko' cacaybing.
balaiq a' kaal sawni halhul ku' wagi'.
balaiq a' kaal sawni halhol ko' wagi'.
S.TRANSL: 今天天氣很好，陽光很溫暖。

S.FORM: balaiq mu uwi ku' kaal sawni. aqih mu ku' qumuwalax.
balaiq mo owi ko' kaal sawni. aqih mo ko' qomowalax.
S.TRANSL: 我也喜歡今天的天氣，不喜歡下雨。

S.FORM: pungan ku' kai' ga, asi ga paquwalax 'i' casan.
pongan ko' kai' ga, asi ga paqowalax 'i' casan.
S.TRANSL: 氣象預報說明天會下雨。

S.FORM: musa' si' inu' ga, ungiay su' maras cu' tata'umuk ki'.
mosa' si' ino' ga, ongiay so' maras co' tata'omok ki'.
kaa' ungii' rasani cu' qutux cu' tata'umuk 'i' yaba'.
kaa' ongii' rasani co' qotox co' tata'omok 'i' yaba'.
S.TRANSL: 別忘了幫爸爸帶一支雨傘。

S.FORM: wal ga. rasanai mu cu' tata'umuk 'i' yaba'.
wal ga. rasanai mo co' tata'omok 'i' yaba'.
S.TRANSL: 好的，我會記得帶爸爸的傘。

S.FORM: piya' cu' buwating ru piya' cu' riax sawni?
piya' co' bowating ro piya' co' riax sawni?
mamatu' cu' buwating ru imagal cu' riax sawni.
mamato' co' bowating ro imagal co' riax sawni.
gumawah ku' sasukuan cu' pila' ru sumatu' cu' pinpinatiq 'i' mamatu' cu' riax quw?
gomawah ko' sasokoan co' pila' ro somato' co' pinpinatiq 'i' mamato' co' riax qow?
kiya' ga, gumawah 'i' kasasanan nanaq ru manaaring cu' mamaspat cu' pancapngan wagi' ru magalpu cu' rusa' pancapngan wagi' nanaq.
kiya' ga, gomawah 'i' kasasanan nanaq ro manaaring co' mamaspat co' pancapngan wagi' ro magalpo co' rosa' pancapngan wagi' nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 有，但是只有早上開，從8點到12點。

S.FORM: piya' pancapngan cu' wagi' ka hani la?
piya' pancapngan co' wagi' ka hani la?
magalpu cu' qun ru maspatul cu' pacapngan ka hani.
magalpo co' qon ro maspatol co' pacapngan ka hani.
macka' ku' pancapngan cu' wagi' su' quw?
macka' ko' pancapngan co' wagi' so' qow?
haylag cu' magalpu pancapngan cu' wagi' mu ru yani cubalay ku' riax ka hani ga magalpu cu' qutux cakaan cu' pancapngan cu' wagi'.
haylag co' magalpo pancapngan co' wagi' mo ro yani cobalay ko' riax ka hani ga magalpo co' qotox cakaan co' pancapngan co' wagi'.
S.TRANSL: 我的錶快了10分鐘，正確時間是11點半。

S.FORM: paqucay misu' han. kiya' sasukuan cu' pila' ru sumatu' cu' ruwas 'i' lalingay 'i' runi quw?
paqocay miso' han. kiya' sasokoan co' pila' ro somato' co' rowas 'i' lalingay 'i' roni qow?
S.TRANSL: 請問這附近有沒有郵局？

S.FORM: kiya' ga, usaing ku' sasukuan cu' pila' ru sumatu' cu' ruwas.
kiya' ga, osaing ko' sasokoan co' pila' ro somato' co' rowas.
paqucay misu' han humicuwa'' i' musa' capang na' kinsawbih na' sasukuan cu' pila' ru sumatu' cu' ruwas 'i' runi.
paqocay miso' han homicowa'' i' mosa' capang na' kinsawbih na' sasokoan co' pila' ro somato' co' rowas 'i' roni.
S.TRANSL: 請問這裡最近的郵局要怎麼去？

S.FORM: asi usa' ru taihuk su' cku' tugal ka sugagay la ga, tatalan su' ku' rahwal ka ma'uba' ka imug la ru usa' tigianan ru asi usa' lawwi ru taihuk su' cku' il la ga tatalan su' la.
asi osa' ro taihok so' cko' togal ka sogagay la ga, tatalan so' ko' rahwal ka ma'oba' ka imog la ro osa' tigianan ro asi osa' lawwi ro taihok so' cko' il la ga tatalan so' la.
S.TRANSL: 一直直走，到第三個路口，看到菜市場(白色的大房子)右轉直走，再向左轉就看到了。

S.FORM: manaaring 'i' runi ru tatuhi na quw?
manaaring 'i' roni ro tatohi na qow?
ini ka tatuhi ru humakay su'ga musa' qutux cu' pancapngan cu' wagi'.
ini ka tatohi ro homakay so'ga mosa' qotox co' pancapngan co' wagi'.
S.TRANSL: 不會很遠，步行大約一小時。

S.FORM: mahuway su' paqucay misu' lawwi kiya' inu' ku' ausa' 'i' lata'.
mahoway so' paqocay miso' lawwi kiya' ino' ko' aosa' 'i' lata'.
S.TRANSL: 好，謝謝，再請問一下，廁所在哪裡？

S.FORM: kiya' tigisapat ka kakabalay cu' imug ru aring cku' balihun ka hani ru usa' tigianan ru pakakiya ku' galgalgan balaiq 'i' makarakiyas la.
kiya' tigisapat ka kakabalay co' imog ro aring cko' balihon ka hani ro osa' tigianan ro pakakiya ko' galgalgan balaiq 'i' makarakiyas la.
S.TRANSL: 在四樓，從這個門出去右轉，可以搭乘電梯上樓。

S.FORM: wal, baqun mu la mahuway su'.
wal, baqon mo la mahoway so'.
paqucay misu' han kiya' ku' rarag mi' isu' quw?
paqocay miso' han kiya' ko' rarag mi' iso' qow?
kiya' 'i' tigiinu' ku' patigibabinasan cu' qabubing?
kiya' 'i' tigiino' ko' patigibabinasan co' qabobing?
kiya' 'i' tigimamatu' nku' ibabawiq na' imu.
kiya' 'i' tigimamato' nko' ibabawiq na' imo.
S.TRANSL: 在六樓。請由右方的手扶梯上樓。

S.FORM: makimabaynay ci' cu' qutux cu'qabubing. ani mawasiq ani matanah ga hanuan.
makimabaynay ci' co' qotox co'qabobing. ani mawasiq ani matanah ga hanoan.
S.TRANSL: 我想買一頂帽子，綠色或紅色都可以。

S.FORM: wal, tali' tikay ku' qabubing ka hani.
wal, tali' tikay ko' qabobing ka hani.
tiku qutux ka qabubing ka hani ga rahwal hayahy pakaaqih 'i' yugun cku' tikay hayhay quw?
tiko qotox ka qabobing ka hani ga rahwal hayahy pakaaqih 'i' yogon cko' tikay hayhay qow?
S.TRANSL: 這頂帽子稍微大了一點。是否能給我小一點的尺寸？

S.FORM: nuhanhan cu' pilapilag han bali' pakaingasug ru mauwah ci' la.
nohanhan co' pilapilag han bali' pakaingasog ro maowah ci' la.
qabubing ka hani yani cubalay swaan mu. paqucay misu' piya' pila' ku' qabubing ka hani.
qabobing ka hani yani cobalay swaan mo. paqocay miso' piya' pila' ko' qabobing ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 我覺得這頂很適合。請問多少錢呢？

S.FORM: sihuwi cu' usaying kabhul la ga mamaspat kabhul ku' capang na' babaiqan la.
sihowi co' osaying kabhol la ga mamaspat kabhol ko' capang na' babaiqan la.
S.TRANSL: 原價打八折後，是八百元。

S.FORM: nahuqun si' lumpug ku' babaiqan la.
nahoqon si' lompog ko' babaiqan la.
cungus niya', ana ga paqucay misu' han aynu' ku' nahuqun mu 'i' lumpug.
congos niya', ana ga paqocay miso' han ayno' ko' nahoqon mo 'i' lompog.
S.TRANSL: 真抱歉，請問是哪個部份有問題？

S.FORM: nahuqun su' ku' hahuwi la, cubalay ga hahuwi cu' mapusal ga yani a' capang na' babaiqan.
nahoqon so' ko' hahowi la, cobalay ga hahowi co' maposal ga yani a' capang na' babaiqan.
S.TRANSL: 你把折扣算錯了，應該是8折才對。

S.FORM: cungus niya', naga' cu' pilapilag han, nabuiwsawv mi' lumpug lawwi.
congos niya', naga' co' pilapilag han, naboiwsawv mi' lompog lawwi.
S.TRANSL: 對不起，我立刻重算，請稍等一下。

S.FORM: wal ga, halay mi lumpug lawwi han.
wal ga, halay mi lompog lawwi han.
S.TRANSL: 那麼我再算一次是應該的。

S.FORM: hahuwi ka lalapgan ka hani ga , ini mu nahuqi' 'i' lumpug la quw?
hahowi ka lalapgan ka hani ga , ini mo nahoqi' 'i' lompog la qow?
yani ku' lalapgan ka hani ga.
yani ko' lalapgan ka hani ga.
ingasug si' sawawan ru cungus niya' ki.
ingasog si' sawawan ro congos niya' ki.
S.TRANSL: 耽誤你這麼久的時間真不好意思。

S.FORM: iqat ga, babaw niya' ga, panabaq tikay ki'.
iqat ga, babaw niya' ga, panabaq tikay ki'.
S.TRANSL: 不會，希望以後你能多注意一點喔！

S.FORM: baq su' cubalay kumal cu' kai' na' Itaal.
baq so' cobalay komal co' kai' na' Itaal.
mahuway su' cubalay ini kabalaiq cuqang ku' kai' mu na' Itaal.
mahoway so' cobalay ini kabalaiq coqang ko' kai' mo na' Itaal.
kiya' ci' matas 'i' hugal ru ukas a' riax ka papkibaqan mu. 'i' mhngaw cu' ga musa' ci' ki' yutas ki' yaki' mu ga maknamatimati' ci' kumal cu' kai' na' Itaal.
kiya' ci' matas 'i' hogal ro okas a' riax ka papkibaqan mo. 'i' mhngaw co' ga mosa' ci' ki' yotas ki' yaki' mo ga maknamatimati' ci' komal co' kai' na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 平常雖然在都市唸書，沒機會練習。但是一放假回阿公、阿嬤家，都盡量說族語。

S.FORM: aku kiya' a' yutas su' ki' yaki' su' ka capang na' papsibaq su' kai' na' Itaal 'i' isu'.
ako kiya' a' yotas so' ki' yaki' so' ka capang na' papsibaq so' kai' na' Itaal 'i' iso'.
S.TRANSL: 原來是有阿公和阿嬤這麼好的語言老師。

S.FORM: inaras mi Bari' cu' hisa ku' tinabiq ka hani.
inaras mi Bari' co' hisa ko' tinabiq ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 這是昨天從苗栗帶回來的麻糬。

S.FORM: yani cubalay a' balaiq na' naniqun ku' hani yani a' capang na' makiniqun mu kariariax wi ga .
yani cobalay a' balaiq na' naniqon ko' hani yani a' capang na' makiniqon mo kariariax wi ga .
S.TRANSL: 這個是很有名的食物，也是我一直想吃的東西。

S.FORM: mahuway su' cubalay 'i' sawni ka sumatu' cu' balaiq na' qaqabu.
mahoway so' cobalay 'i' sawni ka somato' co' balaiq na' qaqabo.
S.TRANSL: 今天真是謝謝你送來這麼好的禮物。

S.FORM: baqun mi' cu' balaiq su' ru maqas ku' kisiliq mu cubalay.
baqon mi' co' balaiq so' ro maqas ko' kisiliq mo cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 知道你也喜歡，真是太好了。

S.FORM: yutas ki' yaki' balaiq ku' pintuwwan mamu cku' kaal ka hani quw?
yotas ki' yaki' balaiq ko' pintowwan mamo cko' kaal ka hani qow?
S.TRANSL: 爺爺和奶奶您們今年的收成好嗎？

S.FORM: aqih gi sumqaquwalax cuqang ru ini kabalaiq cuqang.
aqih gi somqaqowalax coqang ro ini kabalaiq coqang.
S.TRANSL: 因為一直下雨收成不怎麼好。

S.FORM: kiya' pinnumuwa' mamu ka nananuwan na quw?
kiya' pinnomowa' mamo ka nananowan na qow?
S.TRANSL: 你還有種其它的農作物嗎？

S.FORM: kiya' a' pilikaway ru ralu' ru qaym.
kiya' a' pilikaway ro ralo' ro qaym.
kii' balaiq ku' pinnumuwa' mamu ka hani.
kii' balaiq ko' pinnomowa' mamo ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 這些農作物收成還可以吧。

S.FORM: lungulungun mu ga, wana' pakabalaiq ku' pintuwawan si' pilag.
longolongon mo ga, wana' pakabalaiq ko' pintowawan si' pilag.
S.TRANSL: 希望明年收成會好一點。

S.FORM: mahuway su' ru lumanglung cu ga, pakabalaiq ku' pintuwawan su' ru balaiq uwi ku' qinqaynux su'.
mahoway so' ro lomanglong co ga, pakabalaiq ko' pintowawan so' ro balaiq owi ko' qinqaynox so'.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你，也祝你工作順利生活平安。

S.FORM: kiya' qutux a' qumisuwan na' maliku, qutux a' suway na' maliku ru qutux a' suway na' kanayril.
kiya' qotox a' qomisowan na' maliko, qotox a' soway na' maliko ro qotox a' soway na' kanayril.
S.TRANSL: 我有一個哥哥、一個弟弟、一個妹妹。

S.FORM: nanuwan ku' waw nku' matassauway su'?
nanowan ko' waw nko' matassaoway so'?
S.TRANSL: 你的兄弟姊妹從事什麼行業？

S.FORM: papasibaq ku' qumisuwan mu na' maliku, sinsang ku' suway mu na' maliku, matas na' cku' rahwal na' papatiqan ku' suway mu na' kanayril.
papasibaq ko' qomisowan mo na' maliko, sinsang ko' soway mo na' maliko, matas na' cko' rahwal na' papatiqan ko' soway mo na' kanayril.
S.TRANSL: 我哥哥是老師，我弟弟是醫生，我妹妹目前還是大學生。

S.FORM: maskakaruay ta' cku' qutux su' cu' imuwaag uwi quw?
maskakaroay ta' cko' qotox so' co' imowaag owi qow?
S.TRANSL: 也跟我聊聊你的家庭吧？

S.FORM: humicuwa cimu 'i' makababaq ki (kinku) kanayril su'?
homicowa cimo 'i' makababaq ki (kinko) kanayril so'?
S.TRANSL: 你和你太太是怎麼認識的？

S.FORM: minaglug cami 'i' matiq cku' rahwal na' papatiqan.
minaglog cami 'i' matiq cko' rahwal na' papatiqan.
inngasu cimu ' i' maglug la quw?
inngaso cimo ' i' maglog la qow?
kiya' 'i' kumiyum cu' giqas na' waw ka hani na.
kiya' 'i' komiyom co' giqas na' waw ka hani na.
cubalay pisa', minnanuwan han ku' waw niya'.
cobalay pisa', minnanowan han ko' waw niya'.
S.TRANSL: 是喔，他原本是在做什麼的？

S.FORM: capaang na' waw niya' cunga ga, cumapuh.
capaang na' waw niya' conga ga, comapoh.
S.TRANSL: 他原本負責的工作是打掃。

S.FORM: micuwa' ka makiyugun niya' ku' waw niya'.
micowa' ka makiyogon niya' ko' waw niya'.
aqih gi makikumiyum cku' payux tikay a' babaiqan ka waw niya'.
aqih gi makikomiyom cko' payox tikay a' babaiqan ka waw niya'.
